get.summary: List status of all non-draft pipelines
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all pipelines that are not in DRAFT state. Supports filtering by state (excluding DRAFT by default), team, and search. Returns pipeline status and summary information.

schema.description: Filter pipelines by state (e.g., BUILDING, PAUSED, LIVE, ERROR). If omitted, returns all non-draft pipelines.
